actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-304, by Mr. Frost.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3443. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 71.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 275, H. Res. 272 is laid on the table.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3443) to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide for review of certain acquisitions of voting securities of air carriers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3443 (airline acquisitions).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3443) to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide for review of certain acquisitions of voting securities of air carriers, and for other purposes.
